data.text: Nu isttafe shakketidine markkaben gellidi siti giidi Qoos geetettiza abba giidoon diza harure dere bidos; wonttetha gallas hara Ruddi geetettiza abba giidoon diza harure dere gakkidos. Heepekka issi Phaxxira geetettiza kaatama bidosu.
Hen gede Finqqe gizaso biza markkabe dizaro demmidine izin gellidi bidos.

Abba giidoon diza Qophirossa geetettiza haruro derepe hadirssa baggan yeeggidi Soore giza dere biidi Xirossa geetettiza abba achchan diza dere bidos; Hessas gasooy markkabeya ba caanetida caana hen woththanas koshshiza gishaskko.
Hen ammanizayta koyi demmidi isttara lappun gallas gammiidos; Isttikka xiillo ayana kaalethon phawulossa “Yerusalame boppa” gidi yootida.

Nu hen gamm77ana wodey wurin isttafe shakeetidi nu ogge bidos. Istti wuri ba machchetarane ba nayitara isfe kaatamape kare kezana gakkanaas nuna moyizida; Abba achchan nu wuri gullibatidi wossidape guye denddidi issay issara sarootettidi shakettidos.
Hessafe guye nu markkaben gellin istti gede besso simmida.
Nu xiirossape denddidi abba bolla buus wursiidape guye gede Phexelemayis geetettizaso gakkidos. Henkka ammaniza asara gagidi saroketidi hen istta achchan issi gaalas gamidos.
Wonttetha gallas heppe kezidi Qissariya gizaso bidos; Qissariyan lappun daqoonistape issa wonggelawe Philphphosaso gellidi iza achchan shempidos.
Izas nabe gidida oyddu gelontta geella7o nayti deettes.
Daroo gallas hen nu gammin issi Agaboossa geetettiza nabey Yuda derepe yides.

He nabey nukko shiqidine Phawulossa dancco ekkidi ba toone ba kushshe qachchidi “xiillo ayanay hayssa dancca goda Yerusalamen diza ayhuda asati hayssatho qachchidi Ayhuda gidonta deretas aththi immana gees” gides.
Hessa siyidi nukka nunara diza asaykka Phawulossay Yerusalame bontta mala wossides.
Qass Phawulossay nuna inte yeekki yeekkidi ta wozina aazas menththeti? tan Goda Yesussa sunththa gish Yerusalamen qachcho xalala gidoontta hayqanaskkka gigistadis” gides.
Izi nu zoore ekkontta ixxin “histtikko Goda sheney hano” gidi agagides.
Nu hen guuththa gaallasata gammidappe guye nu mishshe wursii gigisidi Yerusalame bidos.
Qissariyan diza issi issi ammanizayiti nunara isfe yida; isttikka nuni Minasonne keeththan daana mala nuna izaso kaalethi Minasonney kasetidi ammanida Qophirose dere asakko.
Nu Yerusalame gakkida mala ammanizayiti nuna uhaaththaayssan mokki ekkida.
Wonttetha gallas Phawulossay nunara Yaqobekko bides; he wode wossa keeththa ciimati hen deettes.
Phawulossay asa wursii saroothidappe guye Xoossi iza baggara Ayhuda gidonta asa giidoon ooththidayssa wursii issino ashshontta yootides.

Hessa siyidi asay wuri xoossu galatides; Phawulossakka hizzgides “nu ishazo daroo shiyan qoodetiza ammanizayti Ayhudista giidoon dizayssine wurkka musse woga wozzinape nagizayita gididayssa nekka errasa.
Neni Ayhuda gidonta dereta giidoon diza Ayhudata <inte nayita qaxxaropite woykko wogata oosopite ga ne tamaarssada asay Musse woga shaarana mala ooththes giza wore asay siydes.
Histtin ha7i azze loo7oy? Hai ne yussa asay tumappe siyana.
Hessa gish nu nena gizayssa ooththa; Nu achchan tasala gaaththana yida oyddu asati deettes.

Ne istta nenara ekkada isttara gidada nena geshsha asati ba huee meyidistana malane Xoossa keeththan immetiza muxxata mishsha ne isttas qanxxa, ne hessaththo ooththikko ne bolla worettidaysi wuri mela gididayssane nekka musse woga polla nagizade gididayssa asay wuri errana.

Hinkko Ayhuda gidonta asape ammanidayta gish gidiko <Eeqqas shuketidi tunidayssa mooppite, suththuka uyoppite, shuketidi suththi biitan gukonta bawutta hayqqida mehe asho moppite, laymmafe hakiite> giidi cimmati qachchida qaala dabbidabe xaahaaththaidi nu isttas yeddidos.”

Hessafe guye Phawulossay he oyddu asata benara ekkidi wonttetha gallas isttara bena geshshides; istti geyiza gaallasati appun gaallaskkone issi issade gish immetiza mishsh immiza wodey aydekkone errisanas xoossa keeth gellides.
Lappun gallas kumana maatishin Isyya derepe yida Ayhuda asay Phawulossa xoossa keeththan beeyidi dera iza bolla denththethidi iza oykkida.

“Isiraele asato! nuna maaddite! nu asane nu woga hayssa nu dizasoza cayishshene derey dizason wursion asa tamaarisizadey hayssi izako; Hesikka gidena gidi Ayhuda gidonta asata xoossa keeth gelliththidi hayssa geshsha sooza tunnisides” gishe wassida.
Istti hessa gida gasooy hayssafe kase Ehaaththaesone yeletta gidida Xirrofimmossa izara isfe kaatama giidoon beeyida gish iza Phawulossay xoossa keeth ekki gellida millatida gishshaskko.
Kumetha kaatamaya ba giidoon shirotides; derey wuri isfe woxxi yidi Phawulossa oykki ekkidi Xoossa keethth gibefe gochochi kessides; Xoossa keeththa penggeti herakka gordetida.
Asay Phawulossa wodhdhan koyshshin “Yerusalame diza kummetha derey ba garssan shirotides” giza kittay Rome olanchata azazizayssakko gakkides.
Hessa gish izi oolanchatanne xeetu oolanchata azazizayta kaaleththidi esoon woxxishe asay dizaso bides; asay olanchata azazizayssa beeydi phawulossa buuka aggida.
Azazizayssi izakko shiiqidi Phawulossa oykkidi nam77u sanssalatan qachchistana mala azazidi izi oonnakkone ayy ooththidakone erranas iza oychchides.

Deereykka ba garssan baggay hessa, baggay hayssa gides; Azazizayssi dereza wasoppe dendidaysan tummay awayssakone erranas danddaetontta ixxin Phawulossa gede oolanchati dizaso ehaaththaana mala azazides.
Phawulossay pude dhoqqaso gakkishin derey daroo hanqqon iza bolla meto gaththanas koyda gish olanchati iza hashshen tokki ehaaththaida.
Deereykka “iza wodhna wodhana” gi wassishe iza kaallides.
Oollanchati Phawulossa ba dizaso gellithana maatishin Phawulossay ollanchata azazizaysa “ta nees issi mishsh yootana mala doosazi” gides. Azazizayskka “ne Girkke qaala errazi?”
Histtin ha7i mata dere giidoon meto denththethada shemppo wodhdhida oyddu shi asa ekkada baazzo baqqatida gibixxe addezi nena gidikki?” gidees.
Phawulossaykka “tani Killiqiya garssan daroo errettida Xerssese kaataman yeelletida Ayhude asa, hayssa asas tana yochcharkki” gides.
Izi hasa7ana mala erro giin Phawulossay dhoqqasoon eqqidi asay coou gaana mala ba kushshera malatides; asat coou giin isiraele nayta qaalara hizzgides.
